1024660653280305152.text:
To clarify terms:
1) Normal exchange: Money goes one way. Goods & services go other way
2) Financial exchange ('Investment'): Money goes one way. Contract for future money (financial instrument) goes other way
3) Speculation: Two sets of either 1 or 2 above. I.e buy X then sell X

950492247258103808.text: Being 'privileged' doesn't mean you don't face struggles, don't work hard, or that you have everything handed to you.
